name: Chisica
description:
A small game made by a team of two in a week for Brakeys Game Jam 2022.1, built around the theme "It is not real".  

In "Chisica" darkness is your enemy but also your friend. Spooky figures will be awakened by your light but they will also fade away in the darkness, like they were never real. Your objective is to find your cat, but which one is the real one?

I started to make a tutorial for the game but didn't get to finish it ¯\_(ツ)_/¯, so I'll just write the controls here:

W,A,S,D - movement

E - ability

LEFT SHIFT - boots
